column5: How is the weather in Nakina during the last week in June. Also, how are the bugs?

It varies, mostly very comfortable, mid 70's up to lower 80's but this year will be in the mid 60's it looks like. Bugs are usually not too bad but pray for a breeze. That's been our week just north of Nakina for the past 8 years, in fact will be there Friday night now that you mention it!
